content: * BOARD DECIDED TO EXPLORE THIS READINESS WITH PERSPECTIVE OF OBTAINING A FINAL OFFER BY 9 JUNE* BOARD DECIDED TO EXPLORE THIS READINESS WITH PERSPECTIVE OF OBTAINING A FINAL OFFER BY 9 JUNE* BOARD OF DIRECTORS ANALYSED IN DEPTH NON-BINDING OFFERS RECEIVED FOR NETCO AND DEEMED THEM NOT YET ADEQUATE* TELECOM ITALIA - OFFERS RECEIVED FOR NETCO FROM CONSORTIUM FORMED BY CDP EQUITY S.P.A. AND MACQUARIE INFRASTRUCTURE AND REAL ASSETS AND BY KKR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
